doc.plot: A young man named Edgar who lived with his brother and grandmother, woke up late for work one day. He gets angry at her grandmother for not waking him up on time, so he starts a conflict with get that doesn't end well and leaves for work. On he's way back home, he is part of a small event that makes him realize that he has disappointed he's grandmother, of course, this made him feel very bad , so he rushes home to ask his grandmother for forgiveness. To he's surprise, when he arrives, no is home. After a while he's brother arrives with terrible news, in earring this , Edgar will find him self dealing with very strong emotions that will make him reflect on he's recent actions.
